name: Creeping Shadows
description:
Description

This game is a puzzle dungeon crawler where the player will explore a labyrinth as a goblin disabling traps and avoiding his own shadow.

How to Play

Use the arrow keys or wasd to move your goblin. The goal is to advance the goblin through the dungeon room to the next door. The shadows will mirror each movement you make so be mindful of how you move. If you get too close to a shadow, they will knock you out and you will return to the entrance of the current room. The shadows can also be used to block projectiles and fight enemies for you. 

Have fun escaping those puzzles!
